mdRecord.dcterms:title: V26348 Looking Into Washington's Tomb, Mt. Vernon, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the interior of George Washington's tomb. View through the gated entrance includes Washington's sarcophagus and several wreaths. Mounted on gray board. Publisher's imprint on the front of the mount reads: Keystone View Company, Manufacturers, Publisher. Copyrighted, Underwood & Underwood. Made in U. S. A. Meadville, Pa. New York, N. Y., Chicago, Ill. London, England. Title - V26348 Looking Into Washington's Tomb, Mt. Vernon, Va. On the reverse, a brief history of Washington's tomb is printed directly on the mount - H91--(V26348) The Tomb of Washington. Copyright by the Keystone View Company.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington, George, 1732-1799--Tomb
